page.title: 20Places of worship
page.content: 1.CofE:St.John The Baptist,Church St. Father Hudson. Servs: 4 on Sun Mass daily.Choir,Mothers'Union,Scouts,Cubs, Guides,Brownies,Art/Craft, discussion Groups.(Mon 8 July 1985 a mediaeval altar discovered during installation of new heating.) 2.The Bethel,57 Station Rd.Servs: 2 on Sun. Congregation:approx 200. Playgroup,youth club,sunday-school and meetings.(Used as refugee camp in war) 3.Salvation Army: Midland Rd services: Sunday 10am,2.15. Singing,ladies meets Over-60's club,senior cits'lunch club, mothers/toddlers,keep-fit,playgroup. 4.RC:Our Lady & StJoseph,Midland Rd. Fr Kelly.Serv:1 on Sun, 1 in week. Cong:approx 100. Mothers' Union. 5.Meth Chapel,Midland Rd.Rev G.Girt. Serv:2 on Sun.Cong:approx 30. Girls' Brig,Sun Sch,Women's Gp,Working Circle Mothers + Toddlers Group.
